57.heading: David, Peter, 1956-
57.title: Final Exam
57.author: script, Peter David ; pencils, Pop Mhan ; inks, Norman Lee ; letters, Michael David Thomas.
notes: 1 v. : col. ill. ; 23 cm.
(SpyBoy)
"This book collects issues 1 through 4 of the Dark Horse comic-book series, Spyboy: Final Exam."

"Splitting his personality between 'normal' high school life and high-tech international espionage has never been easy for Alex Fleming, AKA SpyBoy, but his world is turned upside down when the local police discover a hidden stash of weapons and conclude that he's a terrorist. As the same time, Alex comes face to face with his greatest challenges ever
senior prom, graduation, and the long-awaited truth about his mother! Tossed into this volatile mix is SpyGuy, a deadly new villain gunning for SpyBoy...cleverly disguised as a substitute teacher!"
